Subject: SAFE MATRIX
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: richard f allen <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod/Rodimus Primal::

Hot Rod walks to the boxas, and opens it. He makes sure his signeture
was recorded. He then opens a compartment on his chest, and takes out
the Matrix. He places the Matrix in to the box, and shuts it.
Rodimus's power level is reduced. He is now Hot Rod by power as well as
by name.
"I'm going to go get some shut eye, Kluster. See you later."

(Thats it for me tonight.)
